summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 613 Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Blonde Body Wave Wigs 13x6 HD Transparent Lace Front Wigs Brazilian Virgin Human Hair 150% Density Pre Plucked with Baby Hair Blonde Lace Frontal Wig for Women (20 Inch Body Wave )
Review Date: 2022/05/30
Store: Vligcor
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Vligcor', 'Package Dimensions': '9.61 x 6.77 x 2.36 inches; 13.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '759784671967'}
Review Text: This is the first time I’ve ever ordered a human hair wig and man what a difference. Every time I order a synthetic hair wig I’m disappointed. I didn’t have to pluck this, the hair line looks very natural. The hair is soft, it feels like it’s my own. My only complaint is that it’s a very yellow blonde but I knew that when I ordered it. I’m wondering if I could maybe use my purple shampoo on it and tone it to a more natural blonde. I don’t want to ruin it but I think I’m going to give it a try. Will keep you posted on my results and show a before and after!
Review Title: Gorgeous wig
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan
Review Date: 2022/06/03
Store: By Terry
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'By Terry', 'Item Form': 'powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 3.15 x 0.75 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3700076457087'}
Review Text: I was skeptical about this but decided to give it a try anyways. To my surprise it works pretty well. I don’t wear foundation during the summer, only bronzer/blush and highlighter. My skin gets extremely oily and shiny by the end of the day. I put my bronzer and highlighter on and then applied this powder using a powder brush. I would only use the applicator inclosed with it if I had no other choice. I went out in my yard and watered all of my flowers, it was 80 degrees out so quite warm. Came back inside and looked in the mirror and my face was still matte. Went about the rest of my day which included a 2.5 mile walk with my family. When I went to wash the makeup off my face my nose was only slightly shiny, that’s it. I deducted a star because my skin gets pretty bronzed this time of year, it seemed like the powder washed my color out a little bit. It wasn’t a huge difference but enough to notice.
Review Title: Works well
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L’ange Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 43MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel
Review Date: 2022/07/11
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Color': 'Rose Gold, Black', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.51 x 2.64 x 2.56 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '810108191223'}
Review Text: This is my 2nd argon oil infused brush and I swear by these. My first one was made by Moroccan oil and I had it for years but it ended up cracking from heat. When I saw that Lange made them too I had to order this and I’m hoping it holds up better than the Moroccan brush. I love the light pink color. The brush is solid and high quality. When you blow out your hair with this brush it leaves your hair so soft and smooth. I have wavy frizzy hair and the argan infused brush is seriously a game changer. The price point is spot on. This Lange brush is worth every penny.
Review Title: Such a great brush
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hempz Triple Moisture Hydrating Herbal Hand Creme, 4 oz
Review Date: 2022/07/25
Store: Hempz
Product Description: ['We put hemp seed oil into everything we make, so you get vitamin E, amino acids, and omega fatty acids in every squeeze or swipe.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.13 x 1.38 x 7.25 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '110-2758-03', 'UPC': '676280046580', 'Manufacturer': 'Hempz'}
Review Text: Thus is a large tube, good for keeping in a end table or somewhere around the house. Too big for on the go. It smells nice and moisturizes my hands very well. It’s fast absorbing and not greasy at all. Great price and another great product from Hempz.
Review Title: Nice size tube of cream
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
Review Date: 2022/07/26
Store: Beauty Bakerie
Product Description: ['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'}
Review Text: This is highly pigmented and you only need one coat. I personally think the color cinnamon roll is terrible but that doesn’t mean you won’t like it. It dries very quickly and that’s where it goes down hill. It starts to look dried out and cakey. Giving it 3 stars because it’s definitely smudge proof.
Review Title: High pigment but dries out
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel
Review Date: 2022/08/21
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Handle Material': 'Ceramic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '12.32 x 4.76 x 3.58 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2456', 'UPC': '810108191339'}
Review Text: These brushes are of excellent quality and comparable to Moroccan oil argon oil infused brushes. I own 2 of the 43 MM brushes and jumped on the 53 MM brush when I saw it was available. I love the Lange brushes I have but prefer larger barrels to give my long thin hair extra volume at the roots.  These brushes are great quality and deliver an excellent blow out. My hairs smooth and soft with minimal frizz and it stays that way throughout the day. Argan oil infused brushes have been a game changer with my wavy frizzy hair. While the price is high for some I can promise that it’s worth every cent and you won’t be disappointed.
Review Title: Comparable to Moroccan Oil brushes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel | Blush
Review Date: 2022/09/01
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 3.1 x 3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2459', 'UPC': '810108191315'}
Review Text: This argan-infused round brush is of excellent quality and comparable to Moroccan oils infused brushes. This is the 4th one I’ve ordered, it’s safe to say I’m addicted. I have 2 different sizes for home and 2 different sizes for my house up north. This large barrel gives my long thin hair extra volume at the roots. I get a excellent blow out, my hairs smooth and frizz free. I won’t use any other kind of brush with my wavy frizzy hair. While the price is high for some I can promise that it’s worth every penny and you won’t be disappointed.
Review Title: Comparable to Moroccan oil brushes!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SalonSilk Round Brush Set
Review Date: 2022/12/14
Store: SALON SILK
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SALON SILK', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Material': 'Boar, Nylon, Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '10.67 x 5.12 x 4.8 inches; 1.19 Pounds'}
Review Text: These brushes are good quality for the price you’re paying. They aren’t the greatest brushes I’ve ever used but they’re also a fraction of the price I usually pay. You’re getting a lot for your money. Roughly $7 per brush is a steal for these. They style your hair nicely, the ceramic holds heat to smooth your hair. The bristles do tug on my hair slightly but it’s not a huge issue. They work great on my daughters thick curly hair.
Review Title: Decent brushes for price
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Hair Care**: Predominant focus on high-quality hair products, particularly **argan-infused tools** and **human hair wigs**. Recurring purchases highlight a strong preference for tools designed to manage **wavy and frizzy hair**. 

- **Cosmetics**: Interest in high-performing makeup products, especially **matte powders** and **liquid lip colors**. Positive feedback indicates a tendency toward products that provide **long-lasting and smudge-proof** results, while also being vegan or infused with beneficial ingredients. 

- **Product Quality**: Customer exhibits a preference for **luxury brands** and is willing to pay a higher price for **durability and effectiveness**, especially notable in repeated purchases of specific hair tools.

- **Fragrance/Texture**: Favorable reviews often mention good **scent** and **absorbency** in skincare, particularly in hand creams.

- **Ratings**: Generally provides **high ratings** for satisfactory experiences, with criticisms mostly about product performance against one's expectations or preferences in shade and finish.

- **Shopping Behavior**: Trends towards products that enhance appearance while ensuring comfort and ease of use, alongside a consistent theme of reliance on known product categories before exploring alternatives.

target_interaction.title: Too heavy for fine hair but amazing for thick hair…
target_interaction.text: This was too heavy for my fine thin hair, it left it looking greasy. My daughter has thick beautiful hair and this conditioner was perfect for her. Her hair is so shiny after using the last couple weeks. It’s healthier, easier to manage and so soft. Her frizz has smoothed out, her hair looks better than it’s ever looked. She has highlights in her hair and they’ve stayed bright since using this conditioner.

videos.title: Introducing Moroccanoil Color Care Shampoo & Conditioner
